BatchExecuteStatement.name: BatchExecuteStatement
BatchExecuteStatement.description: Grants permission to run a batch SQL statement over an array of data

BeginTransaction.name: BeginTransaction
BeginTransaction.description: Grants permission to start a SQL transaction

CommitTransaction.name: CommitTransaction
CommitTransaction.description: Grants permission to end a SQL transaction started with the BeginTransaction operation and commits the changes

ExecuteSql.name: ExecuteSql
ExecuteSql.description: Grants permission to run one or more SQL statements. This operation is deprecated. Use the BatchExecuteStatement or ExecuteStatement operation

ExecuteStatement.name: ExecuteStatement
ExecuteStatement.description: Grants permission to run a SQL statement against a database

RollbackTransaction.name: RollbackTransaction
RollbackTransaction.description: Grants permission to perform a rollback of a transaction. Rolling back a transaction cancels its changes
